meta.content: *Snapcode Required ( if you do not have a Snapcode, please call the school.)

h2.strong: CURRENT ECUEA FAMILIES, PLEASE COMPLETE THIS SURVEY

span.strong:
In compliance with the order from Gov. Holcomb, the Academy will remain closed for the rest of this school year & we will continue with eLearning.
State testing (IREAD-3, ILEARN, etc.) for this school year has also been canceled.

font.br: *Please check our website & social media (fb & ig @ecuea) daily for updates

td.div: *Snapcode Required (if you do not have a Snapcode, please call the school.)

font.a: Welcome to East Chicago Urban Enterprise Academy

span.span:
East Chicago Urban Enterprise Academy, our focus is on every student’s individual needs. Your student deserves a quality choice in education. Our safe and nurturing environment embraces every child. Your child will love the nurturing, one-on-one attention – and you will love the results!
Key features include:
​East Chicago Urban Enterprise Academy is authorized by Ball State University and managed by The Leona Group.

font.span: "We are very happy with the school, the teachers and the administration. We have recommended East Chicago Urban Enterprise Academy to our friends, who have switched schools, and are very happy with their choice."

blockquote.br: - East Chicago Urban Enterprise Academy Parent

td.h2: Click the picture below for more information:

div.strong: Click on the button below to access the ILEARN Resources

a.span: ILEARN Released Items - Practice at Home

td.div:
House = Waiver Day (enjoy your family)
Computer = eLearning Day
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
​Casa = Día de exención (disfrute de su familia)
Computadora = Día de eLearning

td.div:
In the event of school closing, notifications are announced through:
Remind App (click link to join. see office for the class code to sign up for mobile notifications)
School Messenger (phone call to families)
Emergency Closing Center (click link)
News Station Tickers (WGN Ch. 9; ABC Ch. 7; NBC Ch. 5, CBS Ch. 2)
ECUEA Website Home Page

br.span: East Chicago Urban Enterprise Academy does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies: Veronica Eskew, School Leader, 1402 E. Chicago Ave., 219.392.3650, veronica.eskew@leonagroup.com

div.div: Managed by The Leona Group | Authorized by Ball State University
